item.description:
The January Meetup will take place during the New England Boat Show, which takes place at the Boston Convention Center on January 12-20. This will be an opportunity to meet other local sailors, find sailing opportunities around Cape Cod Bay, and find some sailing gear. What more could you ask for in the dead of winter?

We will meet in room #156, which is upstairs. We are working on having a few people come to describe sailing opportunities in the area, such as sailing clubs, sailing schools, yacht clubs, etc. We'll start the talks at 6:30pm. There will be time beforehand to just meet the other Meetup members.

We have quite a few local organizations speaking:
SailTime Boston
Courageous Sailing Center
Constitution Yacht Club
Mass Bay Sailors
Winthrop Yacht Club
BoatWise
Boston Harbor Island Alliance
TowBoat U.S.

Afterward, you can walk the show. Admission to the show is $13 for adults.

For full show details, visit http://www.neboatshow....

NOTE: The date of this Meetup changed from Saturday because the Patriots play that night, and you all know that you'd rather be watching them.
item.name: The Boston Sailing January Meetup
